snippet: David Ferrer beat John Isner, 6-7 (3), 6-3, 6-4, 6-2, in Gijón to give the five-time champion Spain an insurmountable 3-1 lead and a shot at a fourth title in five years.
abstract: David Ferrer defeats John Isner, sending Spain to Davis Cup final; other tennis results noted.
lead_paragraph: David Ferrer beat John Isner, 6-7 (3), 6-3, 6-4, 6-2, in Gijón to give the five-time champion Spain an insurmountable 3-1 lead and a shot at a fourth title in five years.

headline.main: Ferrer Wins as Spain Ousts U.S. in Davis Cup
headline.print_headline: Ferrer Wins as Spain Ousts U.S. in Davis Cup
